description: An 8' flute listed only by Wedgwood, who says: �A variety of Hohlflöte used by Messrs. Brindley & Foster, of Sheffield.� Examples Only one example is known. Contributions welcome. Flute Fondomentale [sic] 8', Great; St. Mary's Church, Petworth, West Sussex, England; Brindley & Foster 1903. Moved to Choir in a later rebuild. Bibliography Wedgwood[1]: Flûte Fondamentale.
